residency_requirement: three years of residence in Canada during the four years preceding their application
evidence_assessment: FOSS notes and U.S. tax forms contradicted his claims
decision_reasoning: decision was reasonable and supported by evidence
application_details: Applicant's citizenship application was denied due to insufficient proof of residency
procedure_followed: Appeal to Federal Court challenging the Citizenship Judge's decision based on alleged procedural errors and misinterpretation of evidence
